Documentation automatically generated from the source code comments:

library links description status
arche-biblatex docs
github		 dissemination service mapping ARCHE metadata to BibLaTeX
arche-core docs
github		 ARCHE core code
arche-dashboard docs
github		 GUI providing ARCHE metadata statistics
arche-doorkeeper docs
github		 ACDH handlers plugged into the arche-core
arche-fcs docs
github		 CLARIN FCS endpoint for ARCHE
  • arche-gui
    Drupal 8 GUI for ARCHE (github)
  • arche-lib
    PHP bindings for the repository API (both REST and direct database access) (github)
  • arche-lib-disserv
    arche-lib extention providing dissemination service features (github)
  • arche-lib-ingest
    high-level PHP library for data ingestion (both metadata and binaries) (github)
  • arche-lib-schema
    high-level representation of the repository’s ontology data (github)
  • arche-oaipmh
    OAI-PMH service for the ARCHE (github)
  • arche-resolver
    resolver for the ARCHE (a service providing ARCHE own PID service and redirection to correct dissemination services based on a requested response format) (github)
  • arche-schema-ingest
    PHP library for ingesting ACDH ontology into the ARCHE (github)
  • arche-thumbnails
    dissemination service generating ARCHE resources’ thumbnails (github)
